languages.text: {n}В разговор вклинивается пухлый розовощекий старик с глубоким, певучим голосом.{/n} "Император защищает, Ваша Светлость! Смею заверить, что в топливном отсеке не гнездится никакой ереси. Секта Огненных пророчеств была испытана на чистоту и признана соответствующей Кредо. Их лидер, именующий себя Огненным оракулом, набожен и покорен Его слугам. Они не искажают священное учение, что же касается избранных ими форм поклонения — они не редки и не удивительны. В Империуме немало подобных мелких культов, одобренных {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Экклезиархией{/g}".

{n}A plump, rosy-cheeked old man steps forward, his voice deep and sonorous:{/n} "The Emperor protects, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I can assure you that there is no heresy festering in the fuel compartment. The Sect of the Fire Prophecies has been tested for purity and found to be in accordance with the Creed. Their leader, who calls himself the Oracle of Fire, is devout and submissive to His servants. They do not twist the sacred teachings, and as for their chosen forms of worship, these are neither rare nor remarkable. Many such minor cults exist in the Imperium with the full approval of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}."
languages.original_text: {n}В разговор вклинивается пухлый розовощекий старик с глубоким, певучим голосом.{/n} "Император защищает, Ваша Светлость! Смею заверить, что в топливном отсеке не гнездится никакой ереси. Секта Огненных пророчеств была испытана на чистоту и признана соответствующей Кредо. Их лидер, именующий себя Огненным оракулом, набожен и покорен Его слугам. Они не искажают священное учение, что же касается избранных ими форм поклонения — они не редки и не удивительны. В Империуме немало подобных мелких культов, одобренных {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Экклезиархией{/g}".

languages.text: {n}Un anciano orondo de mejillas sonrosadas da un paso al frente y habla con voz profunda y potente:{/n} «¡El Emperador protege, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Le aseguro que no hay ninguna herejía en el compartimento de combustible. Hemos puesto a prueba la pureza de la Secta de las Profecías Ígneas y todo coincide con el Credo. Su líder, que se hace llamar el Oráculo del Fuego, es devoto y obediente ante Sus sirvientes. No profanan las enseñanzas sagradas y sus formas de adoración no son infrecuentes ni excepcionales. Existen numerosos cultos menores como este en el Imperium con la aprobación de la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Eclesiarquía{/g}».
languages.original_text: {n}A plump, rosy-cheeked old man steps forward, his voice deep and sonorous:{/n} "The Emperor protects, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I can assure you that there is no heresy festering in the fuel compartment. The Sect of the Fire Prophecies has been tested for purity and found to be in accordance with the Creed. Le aseguro que no hay ninguna herejía en el compartimento de combustible. Hemos puesto a prueba la pureza de la Secta de las Profecías Ígneas y todo coincide con el Credo. Su líder, que se hace llamar el Oráculo del Fuego, es devoto y obediente ante Sus sirvientes. No profanan las enseñanzas sagradas y sus formas de adoración no son infrecuentes ni excepcionales. Existen numerosos cultos menores como este en el Imperium con la aprobación de la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Eclesiarquía{/g}».

languages.text: {n}ふくよかでバラ色の頬をした老人が一歩前に進み出る。その声は深く朗々としていた。{/n} 「皇帝の守護がありますよう、閣下！燃料区画に異端が巣食っていないと断言いたします。炎の予言の宗派は健全性を検査され、信条に従っていることが判明しました。炎のオラクルと自称していた指導者は、敬虔かつ主の従者に従順です。彼らは聖なる教えを捻じ曲げてはおらず、選んだ崇拝の形式についても、珍しいものでも特筆するべきものでもありません。このような小さな教団は帝国に数多く存在しており、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}帝国聖教会{/g}により全面的に承認されています」
languages.original_text: {n}A plump, rosy-cheeked old man steps forward, his voice deep and sonorous:{/n} "The Emperor protects, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I can assure you that there is no heresy festering in the fuel compartment. The Sect of the Fire Prophecies has been tested for purity and found to be in accordance with the Creed. Their leader, who calls himself the Oracle of Fire, is devout and submissive to His servants. They do not twist the sacred teachings, and as for their chosen forms of worship, these are neither rare nor remarkable. Many such minor cults exist in the Imperium with the full approval of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}ふくよかでバラ色の頬をした老人が一歩前に進み出る。その声は深く朗々としていた。{/n}「皇帝の守護がありますよう、閣下！燃料区画に異端が巣食っていないと断言いたします。炎の予言の宗派は健全性を検査され、信条に従っていることが判明しました。炎のオラクルと自称していた指導者は、敬虔かつ主の従者に従順です。彼らは聖なる教えを捻じ曲げてはおらず、選んだ崇拝の形式についても、珍しいものでも特筆するべきものでもありません。このような小さな教団は帝国に数多く存在しており、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}帝国聖教会{/g}により全面的に承認されています」

languages.text: {n}一位脸色红润、体态发福的老人走了过来，开了口，他的声音低沉而洪亮。{/n} “帝皇保佑众生，大人！我可以向您保证，燃油舱室里没有任何异端分子。烈火先知教团的所有成员都通过了纯洁性测试，所有人的信念都与国教教条保持一致。教团领袖自称为烈焰神谕，他对神皇的仆从无比顺从，他们从来没有歪曲过神圣的教义。至于他们选择拜火作为祭拜的形式，这既不罕见，也不值得特别注意。整个帝国存在着无数像这样的拜火教派，他们都得到了{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}国教{/g}的充分认可。”
languages.original_text: {n}A plump, rosy-cheeked old man steps forward, his voice deep and sonorous:{/n} "The Emperor protects, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I can assure you that there is no heresy festering in the fuel compartment. The Sect of the Fire Prophecies has been tested for purity and found to be in accordance with the Creed. Their leader, who calls himself the Oracle of Fire, is devout and submissive to His servants. They do not twist the sacred teachings, and as for their chosen forms of worship, these are neither rare nor remarkable. Many such minor cults exist in the Imperium with the full approval of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}一位脸色红润、体态发福的老人走了过来，开了口，他的声音低沉而洪亮。{/n}“帝皇保佑众生，大人！我可以向您保证，燃油舱室里没有任何异端分子。烈火先知教团的所有成员都通过了纯洁性测试，所有人的信念都与国教教条保持一致。教团领袖自称为烈焰神谕，他对神皇的仆从无比顺从，他们从来没有歪曲过神圣的教义。至于他们选择拜火作为祭拜的形式，这既不罕见，也不值得特别注意。整个帝国存在着无数像这样的拜火教派，他们都得到了{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}国教{/g}的充分认可。”

languages.text: {n}Ein plumper alter Mann mit rosigen Wangen tritt vor und erklärt mit tiefer Stimme:{/n} "Der Imperator schützt uns, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Ich kann Euch versichern, dass es im Treibstoffmodul keinerlei Ketzerei gibt. Die Sekte der Feuerprophezeiungen wurde hinsichtlich ihrer Reinheit geprüft und für glaubenskonform befunden. Ihr Anführer, der sich selbst Orakel des Feuers nennt, ist Seinen Dienern gegenüber devot und unterwürfig. Sie verstoßen nicht gegen die heiligen Lehren und ihre Formen der Verehrung sind weder selten, noch bemerkenswert. Innerhalb des Imperiums gibt es viele niedere Kulte wie diesen, die von der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ekklesiarchie{/g} vollumfänglich geduldet werden."
languages.original_text: {n}A plump, rosy-cheeked old man steps forward, his voice deep and sonorous:{/n} "The Emperor protects, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I can assure you that there is no heresy festering in the fuel compartment. The Sect of the Fire Prophecies has been tested for purity and found to be in accordance with the Creed. Their leader, who calls himself the Oracle of Fire, is devout and submissive to His servants. They do not twist the sacred teachings, and as for their chosen forms of worship, these are neither rare nor remarkable. Many such minor cults exist in the Imperium with the full approval of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein plumper alter Mann mit rosigen Wangen tritt vor und erklärt mit tiefer Stimme:"Der Imperator schützt uns, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Ich kann Euch versichern, dass es im Treibstoffmodul keinerlei Ketzerei gibt. Die Sekte der Feuerprophezeiungen wurde hinsichtlich ihrer Reinheit geprüft und für glaubenskonform befunden. Ihr Anführer, der sich selbst Orakel des Feuers nennt, ist Seinen Dienern gegenüber devot und unterwürfig. Sie verstoßen nicht gegen die heiligen Lehren und ihre Formen der Verehrung sind weder selten, noch bemerkenswert. Innerhalb des Imperiums gibt es viele niedere Kulte wie diesen, die von der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ekklesiarchie{/g} vollumfänglich geduldet werden."

languages.text: {n}Un vieil homme bien en chair au visage rubicond s'avance et prend la parole d'une voix profonde et sonore:{/n} « L'Empereur protège, Votre Seigneurie ! Je peux vous assurer que ce qui se passe dans le réservoir de carburant n'a rien d'une hérésie. La Secte des prophéties de feu a subi le test de pureté et s'est révélée conforme au Crédo. Leur chef, qui se fait appeler l'oracle du feu, est un homme pieux soumis à Ses serviteurs. Ils ne déforment en rien les enseignements sacrés. Quant à leurs rituels, ils n'ont rien d'exceptionnel. Bien d'autres cultes mineurs de ce type existent dans l'Imperium avec la pleine approbation de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclésiarchie{/g}. »
languages.original_text: {n}A plump, rosy-cheeked old man steps forward, his voice deep and sonorous:{/n} "The Emperor protects, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I can assure you that there is no heresy festering in the fuel compartment. The Sect of the Fire Prophecies has been tested for purity and found to be in accordance with the Creed. Their leader, who calls himself the Oracle of Fire, is devout and submissive to His servants. They do not twist the sacred teachings, and as for their chosen forms of worship, these are neither rare nor remarkable. Many such minor cults exist in the Imperium with the full approval of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un vieil homme bien en chair au visage rubicond s'avance et prend la parole d'une voix profonde et sonore :{/n} « L'Empereur protège, Votre Seigneurie ! Je peux vous assurer que ce qui se passe dans le réservoir de carburant n'a rien d'une hérésie. La Secte des prophéties de feu a subi le test de pureté et s'est révélée conforme au Crédo. Leur chef, qui se fait appeler l'oracle du feu, est un homme pieux soumis à Ses serviteurs. Ils ne déforment en rien les enseignements sacrés. Quant à leurs rituels, ils n'ont rien d'exceptionnel. Bien d'autres cultes mineurs de ce type existent dans l'Imperium avec la pleine approbation de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclésiarchie{/g}. »

languages.text: {n}Tombul, pembe yanaklı bir adam öne çıkıyor. Derinden gelen, gür bir sesi var.{/n} "İmparator korur {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Yakıt kompartımanına kâfirlik bulaşmadığına dair sizi temin ederim. Ateş Cemaati Kehanetleri, saflık testine tabi tutuldu ve İtikat'la uyumlu bulundu. Kendine Ateş Kâhini olarak adlandıran liderleri, dindar ve O'nun hizmetkârlarına karşı itaatkâr birisi. Kutsal öğretileri çarpıtmıyorlar. Seçtikleri ibadet yöntemleri ise ne eşine az rastlanır türden ne de dikkat çekici. İmparatorluk'un dört bir yanında {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ekleşiarşi{/g}'nin tam izniyle varlığını sürdüren böylesi nice küçük tarikat mevcut."
languages.original_text: {n}A plump, rosy-cheeked old man steps forward, his voice deep and sonorous:{/n} "The Emperor protects, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I can assure you that there is no heresy festering in the fuel compartment. The Sect of the Fire Prophecies has been tested for purity and found to be in accordance with the Creed. Their leader, who calls himself the Oracle of Fire, is devout and submissive to His servants. They do not twist the sacred teachings, and as for their chosen forms of worship, these are neither rare nor remarkable. Many such minor cults exist in the Imperium with the full approval of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}."
